Title: Clog: Client Logging for .NET
Description: Clog is a customizable log provider system that allows you to harness your existing logging system to log client side messages to your server using WCF. Includes Silverlight and WPF sample applications.
HomeWiki:
Clog is a customizable log provider system that allows you to harness your existing logging system to log client side messages to your server using WCF. Includes Silverlight and WPF sample applications.

Clog supports the Desktop CLR and Silverlight 3

The latest Clog source code is located with the Calcium source code.

Please note that Clog is independent of Calcium. In other words you don't need Calcium to use Clog. The reason for the single source control repository is that it is easier to maintain.

For further information about this project please see
  • http://www.codeproject.com/KB/WPF/WpfLogging.aspx
  • http://www.codeproject.com/KB/silverlight/SilverlightLogging.aspx.

Clog is a project by Daniel Vaughan
